channel.title: .::What do i need to do to make my server a no-ip server?::
channel.description:
Hello everyone, i am having some trouble with making my server a no-ip. [b]-I made an account -Created a host -Downloaded the DUC thing from www.no-ip.com -Went to my network thing, and did the port-to-port thing.[/b]
I do not know what i have done wrong, or what else i need to do to make my server work as a no-ip.
Just need some help, Thanks a lot.
-King-[br][br][size=1]Posted on: July 18, 2008, 10:14:32 AM[/size][hr]Anyone? :D

item.title: .::What do i need to do to make my server a no-ip server?::
item.dc:creator: @Owner_King Owner King
item.description:
@Owner_King wrote:

Hello everyone, i am having some trouble with making my server a no-ip.
-I made an account
-Created a host
-Downloaded the DUC thing from www.no-ip.com
-Went to my network thing, and did the port-to-port thing.

I do not know what i have done wrong, or what else i need to do to make my server work as a no-ip.

Just need some help, Thanks a lot.

-King-[br][br][size=1]Posted on: July 18, 2008, 10:14:32 AM[/size][hr]Anyone?
